mapper.select: SELECT e.employee_name, e.employee_num, d.department_name FROM employee AS e JOIN department AS d ON e.department_seq = d.department_seq WHERE e.employee_role = "mentee"

SELECT e.employee_name, e.employee_num, d.department_name FROM employee AS e JOIN department AS d ON e.department_seq = d.department_seq WHERE e.department_seq = #{departmentSeq} AND e.employee_role = "mentee"
SELECT e.employee_name, e.employee_num, d.department_name FROM employee AS e JOIN department AS d ON e.department_seq = d.department_seq WHERE e.employee_role = "mentor"

SELECT e.employee_name AS employeeName, e.employee_role AS employeeRole, p.position_name AS positionName, e.employee_phone AS employeePhone, e.employee_email AS employeeEmail, f.file_url AS fileUrl FROM employee AS e JOIN positions AS p ON e.position_seq = p.position_seq LEFT JOIN file AS f ON e.employee_seq = f.employee_seq WHERE e.employee_seq = #{employeeSeq}
